summary: Fix is appropriately designed. create_or_get() pattern is standard PostgreSQL idiom, race condition handling is necessary for concurrent pipelines. Only 1 LOW finding (acceptable code similarity, not bloat).

issues.title: Similar evidence routing code in two places
issues.why: Both OrphanMatcher._add_to_graduated_story and StoryCreationService._create_or_update_orphan have similar evidence_service.add_conversation() calls. However, they handle different data types (ExtractedTheme vs ConversationData) and serve different pipelines.
issues.fix: No action required. The ~15 lines of similarity is acceptable. YAGNI - wait for a third use case before extracting a shared helper.

notes.create_or_get: Standard PostgreSQL ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING + re-read pattern. Not over-engineered.
notes.race_handling: Necessary for concurrent pipeline workers. Not premature optimization.
notes.evidence_service_param: Actively used by OrphanIntegrationService. Valid dependency injection.
notes.stories_appended: 1-line counter addition for observability. Minimal instrumentation.
